@Reconstructor_2D/it_recon.m

00001 % =====================================================================
00002 %> @brief it_recon performs general scheme of iterative reconstruction.
00003 %> Function is overload.
00004 %>         
00005 %> @param First:varargin{1} disp_mode 'display' or 'no_display' during reconstruction
00006 %>
00007 %> @param Second:varargin{1} algorithm params (struct), struct properties are:
00008 %> @param Second:varargin{1}:struct:method iterative algorithm method (equation for one step)
00009 %> @param Second:varargin{1}:struct:method:name 'LBP' linearized backprojection
00010 %> @param Second:varargin{1}:struct:method:name 'Landweber' gradient steepest descent with small step (default)
00011 %> @param Second:varargin{1}:struct:method:name 'LandweberNormalized' Landweber for normalized data
00012 %> @param Second:varargin{1}:struct:method:name 'NewtonRaphson' nonlinear Gauss-Newton with regularization
00013 %> @param Second:varargin{1}:struct:method:name 'NewtonRaphsonConstrained' nonlinear Gauss-Newton with regularization and a constrain
00014 %> @param Second:varargin{1}:struct:method:name 'LM' nonlinear Gauss-Newton with Marquardt regularization        
00015 %> @param Second:varargin{1}:struct:numiter     stop after 'numiter' iterations
00016 %> @param Second:varargin{1}:struct:stop_delta  stop when image changes are lower than 'stop_delta'
00017 %> @param Second:varargin{1}:struct:update_method 'modulo' or 'auto' method of selecting moment for sensitivity matrix update
00018 %> @param Second:varargin{1}:struct:iter_mod      update sensitivity matrix modulo 'iter_mod' iteration 
00019 %> @param Second:varargin{1}:struct:update_delta  update sensitivity where dC becomes lower than 'update_delta'
00020 %> @param Second:varargin{1}:struct:alpha         relaxation factor (step length)
00021 %> @param Second:varargin{1}:struct:alphalimit    limitation of relaxation factor: 'adapt or 'noadapt'
00022 %> @param Second:varargin{1}:struct:regular       'manual', 'l_curve' or 'GCV' selection of regularization parameter u
00023 %> @param Second:varargin{1}:struct:u            Thikonov regularization factor for matrix pseudo inverse
00024 %> @param Second:varargin{2} disp_mode 'display' or 'no_display' during reconstruction
00025 %>
00026 %> @retval Ep new better estimation of permittivity
00027 % =====================================================================
00028 function  [Ep] = it_recon(varargin)

00030 % the last test was
00031 % it_recon(sensor,boundary,object,'NewtonRaphsonLimited',300,5000,1.2,0.0002);
00032 % it_recon(sensor,boundary,object,'NewtonRaphson',300,5000,0.6,0.0002);

00034 if nargin==2 % default algorithm params
00035     rec_obj=varargin{1};

00093         rec_obj.u=u;
00094         
00095     else
00096         error('This is not struct')
00097     end
00098     
00099 else
00100     error('Too less or to much input elements');
00101 end
00102 
00103 S      = rec_obj.S;
00104 S_     = S;
00105 Sn_resize=rec_obj.Ef_max.Sn_resize;
00106 Ep_max = rec_obj.Ep_max; 
00107 Ep_min = rec_obj.Ep_min; 
00108 Ep     = rec_obj.Ep;

00112 Ep_Pha     = rec_obj.Ep_Pha;      
00113 Ep_Pha_map = rec_obj.Ep_Pha_map;

00116 S_0_=rec_obj.S_0;

00119 Ep_maps_iter(:,:,1)=rec_obj.Ep_0_map(:,:); % starting permittivity
00120 
00121 matrix_size=rec_obj.matrix_size;

00124 % reprojection - projection for initial solution
00125 C_max = rec_obj.C_max;
00126 C_min = rec_obj.C_min; 
00127                          
00128 Cr_0  = rec_obj.Cr_0;
00129 %Cr_0  = (Cr_0-C_min)./(C_max-C_min);
00130 
00131 % normalized measurement
00132 Cm_n = rec_obj.Cm_n;
00133 %Cm   = Cm_n;            
00134 % projections denormalization using simulated max & min
00135 Cm   = rec_obj.Cm;
00136 Cr   = rec_obj.Cr_0;
00137 
00138 
00139 % #####################################################################
00140 % reconstruction errors 
00141 %[S_Pha_, S_0_, S_] = rec_obj.fov_center (sensor, S_Pha_map, S_0_map, S_map);
00142 [rec_obj.errors.Cap(1) rec_obj.errors.Imag(1) rec_obj.errors.Sens(1)] = rec_obj.recon_qual(Ep_Pha, S_Pha_, Cm, ... 
00143                                                             Ep_0,   S_0_,   Cr_0, ...
00144                                                             Ep,     S_,     Cr, '2one');                                                   
00145                                                        
00146 % optimal u (Tikhonov regularization parameter) using l-curve
00147 if strcmp(regular,'L-curve')==1
00148     fh_uTikhonov = figure(3026);
00149     [U,s,V] = csvd(S);
00150     [rec_obj.u,G,reg_param] = l_curve(U,s,Cm);
00151 end
00152     
00153 % #####################################################################
00154             % algorithm parameters
00155 
00156             [a1(1) b1(1)] = rec_obj.step_length(rec_obj.S,Cr,Cm,rec_obj.Ep,rec_obj.Ep_,rec_obj.u);
00157             rec_obj.alpha = a1(1);
00158             rec_obj.alpha_ = rec_obj.alpha;
00159             beta  = b1(1);
00160             rec_obj.param.Alpha(1) = rec_obj.alpha_;
00161             u_ = rec_obj.u;
00162             rec_obj.param.U(1) = rec_obj.u;
00163             rec_obj.param.Updating(1) = 0;

00165 % reconstruction should be performed in FOV only
00166 FOVidx=1:1:numel(Ep);
00167 
00168 % reconstruction time
00169 t=cputime; 
00170 %tic;

00172 % memory alloc for vector of eps maps in each iteration
00173 rec_obj.Ep_maps_iter=ones(rec_obj.Ef_pha.simulation_discret_matrix_size,rec_obj.Ef_pha.simulation_discret_matrix_size,rec_obj.numiter);
00174 
00175 for i=1:numiter
00176     rec_obj.current_iter=i;
00177     % remember estimate from previous step
00178             
00179     Ep_     = Ep;
00180     Ep_map_ = Ep_map;
00181     
00182     % one step of reconstruction algorithm - Ep(i)
00183     if strcmp(method, 'LBP')==1        
00184         Ep = rec_obj.alg_LBP(rec_obj.Cm_n,Sn_resize);
00185         
00186     elseif strcmp(method, 'Landweber')==1
00187         Ep(FOVidx) = rec_obj.alg_Landweber(S(:,FOVidx),Cr,Cm,Ep(FOVidx),alpha);
00188     elseif strcmp(method, 'LandweberNormalized')==1
00189         Ep(FOVidx) = rec_obj.alg_Landweber_Norm(S(:,FOVidx),Cr,Cm,Ep(FOVidx),alpha);
00190     elseif strcmp(method, 'NewtonRaphson')==1
00191         Ep(FOVidx) = rec_obj.alg_NewtonRa_Limit(S(:,FOVidx),Cr,Cm,Ep(FOVidx),alpha,u,'no');
00192     elseif strcmp(method, 'NewtonRaphsonConstrained')==1
00193         Ep(FOVidx) = rec_obj.alg_NewtonRa_Limit(S(:,FOVidx),Cr,Cm,Ep(FOVidx),alpha,u,'constrain',1,150);
00194     elseif strcmp(method, 'LBP_LM')==1
00195          if i==1
00196           Ep = rec_obj.alg_LBP(rec_obj.Cm_n,Sn_resize);          
00197          else
00198         Ep(FOVidx) = rec_obj.alg_LevenMarq_Limit(S(:,FOVidx),Cr,Cm,Ep(FOVidx),alpha,u,'constrain',0.5,10);
00199          end
00200     elseif strcmp(method, 'LM')==1         
00201         Ep(FOVidx) = rec_obj.alg_LevenMarq_Limit(S(:,FOVidx),Cr,Cm,Ep(FOVidx),alpha,u,'constrain',0.5,10);         
00202     elseif strcmp(method, 'LM3')==1        
00203         Ep(FOVidx) = alg_LevenMarq_Limit3(S(:,FOVidx),Cr,Cm,Ep(FOVidx),Ep_(FOVidx),alpha,beta,u,'constrain',1,150);
00204     else
00205         disp 'unknown name of reconstruction method';
00206         return;
00207     end 
00208 
00209     % vector 2 map
00210    
00211     Ep_map = reshape(Ep,rec_obj.Ef_pha.simulation_discret_matrix_size,rec_obj.Ef_pha.simulation_discret_matrix_size);
00212 
00213     % #######################################
00214     % reprojection - current estimate of solution gives the measurements
00215     
00216     % remember previous value
00217     Cr_ = Cr;
00218     
00219     Cr = S * Ep;
00220     
00221     Cr_n = (Cr-C_min)./(C_max-C_min);
00222     
00223         
00224     % #####################################################################
00225     % reconstruction errors 
00226     %[S_Pha_, S_0_, S_] = fov_center (sensor, S_Pha_map, S_0_map, S_map);
00227     [rec_obj.errors.Cap(1+i) rec_obj.errors.Imag(1+i) rec_obj.errors.Sens(1+i)] = rec_obj.recon_qual(Ep_Pha, S_Pha_, Cm, ... 
00228                                                                       Ep_0,   S_0_,   Cr_0, ...
00229                                                                       Ep,     S_,     Cr , '2one');
00230 
00231             
00232  if strcmp(alphalimit,'noadapt')==1
00233        
00234     elseif strcmp(alphalimit,'adapt')==1
00235      
00236         if rec_obj.errors.Cap(1+i) > rec_obj.errors.Cap(i)          
00237                         Ep     = Ep_;
00238                         Ep_map = Ep_map_;
00239                         Cr     = Cr_;
00240                         
00241             rec_obj.alpha = rec_obj.alpha/2;  
00242             rec_obj.alpha_=rec_obj.alpha;
00243             continue;
00244         end
00245  else
00246         disp 'ERR: unknow value of 'alphalimit' argument';
00247         return;
00248  end
00249     
00250   rec_obj.Cr_iter(:,i)=rec_obj.Cr(:);  
00251     % stop the iteration whene there is no progres
00252     
00253         dE = abs(rec_obj.errors.Imag(1+i) - rec_obj.errors.Imag(i));
00254         if dE < stop_delta
00255             disp 'STOP: no change of estimate.';
00256             return;
00257         end
00258     
00259 
00260 
00261     % #################################
00262     % update the sensitivity matrix 
00263     
00264         
00265         if strcmp(update_method,'modulo')==1
00266             update_sens_flag = 0;
00267             if mod(i,iter_mod)==0 
00268                 update_sens_flag = 1;
00269             end
00270         elseif strcmp(update_method,'auto')==1
00271             dC = rec_obj.errors.Cap(1+i) - rec_obj.errors.Cap(i);
00272             update_sens_flag = 0;
00273             if dC > -update_delta
00274                 update_sens_flag = 1;
00275                 % update_delta = update_delta/2;
00276             end
00277         else
00278             disp 'ERR: unknow value of 'update_method' argument';
00279             return;
00280         end        
00281 
00282         if update_sens_flag==1
00283             rec_obj.param.Updating(1+i) = 0.1;
00284 
00285             ep_map = Ep_map;
00286             
00287             % ep_map = enhance(Ep_map,i,0);
00288             % rec_obj.Ef_pha.permittivity_distribution.getFOV(rec_obj.matrix_size, rescale,threshold, method)
00289             ep_map = rec_obj.Ef_pha.putFOV(rec_obj.Ef_pha.sensor, rec_obj.Ef_pha.permittivity_distribution, Ep_map, 'bilinear',0);
00290             % ep_map = putFOV(sensor, Ep_00_map, Ep_map, 'bilinear', 1);
00291             
00292             % constrain: we know that eps >= 1
00293             Ep_map_lim = ep_map;
00294             [p] = find(Ep_map_lim<1);
00295             Ep_map_lim(p) = 1;
00296             
00297 %             [p] = find(Ep_map_lim>80);
00298 %             Ep_map_lim(p) = 80;
00299 
00300             % compute new sensitivity matrix
00301             k=length(rec_obj.Ef_pha.sensor.vector_sensor_elements);
00302             for l=1:k
00303                 name=rec_obj.Ef_pha.sensor.vector_sensor_elements(l).element_name;
00304                 if strcmp(name,'fov')
00305                     fov=rec_obj.Ef_pha.sensor.vector_sensor_elements(l);
00306                 end
00307             end
00308             
00309             tmp_perm=Permittivity_distribution_2D(fov);
00310             tmp_perm.Discretization_grid_perm.value_list=reshape(ep_map,1,numel(ep_map));
00311             Ef_tmp=Electrical_field_2D(rec_obj.Ef_pha.sensor,tmp_perm,rec_obj.Ef_pha.simulation_discret_matrix_size);
00312             S=Ef_tmp.S_resize;
00313             S_=S;
00314             S_map=Ef_tmp.S_map_resize;
00315 %            [S S_map V_map Sn Sn_map] = make_sensitivity_matrix(sensor,boundary,Ep_map_lim,0);
00316             %object.sens.S_map_updated = S_map;
00317                         
00318             % Decymacja mapy czu³osci do rozmiaru rekonstrukcji
00319 
00320 
00321             % new u when new estimate of S is calculated
00322             % optimal u (Tikhonov regularization parameter) using gcv
00323             if strcmp(regular,'L-curve')==1
00324 %                figure (fh_uTikhonov);
00325                 [U,s,V] = csvd(S);
00326                 [rec_obj.u,G,reg_param] = l_curve(U,s,Cm);
00327                 u=rec_obj.u;
00328             end
00329 
00330             % modify step lenght (relaxation parameter)
00331             % alpha = alpha/40;
00332             % u = u / 5;
00333         end % of update of sensitivity
00334                     
00335     %%%%
00336     % jeli w³¹czona odpowiednia opcja u¿yj metody Koreañczyków

00343 %     end

00345 
00346      rec_obj.param.Alpha(1+i) = alpha;
00347      rec_obj.param.U(1+i) = u;
00348 %     param.Updating(1+i) = 0;

00351 rec_obj.S=S;
00352 rec_obj.Ep_max=Ep_max; 
00353 rec_obj.Ep_min=Ep_min;

00355 rec_obj.Ep=Ep;
00356 rec_obj.maps_number=i+1;
00357 rec_obj.Ep_maps_iter(:,:,rec_obj.maps_number)=Ep_map(:,:); % first map is start solution
00358 
00359 
00360 rec_obj.Ep_map=Ep_map;
00361 rec_obj.Cr=Cr;

00378 disp 'STOP. Maximum number of iteration reached.';
